JackCpp Documentation

0.3.1

Overview

JackCpp is a couple c++ classes which wrap the Jack audio io api and lock-free ring buffer. It was written by Alex Norman. The documentation includes some text taken directly from the JACK Audio Connection Kit API reference by Paul Davis (and others).

Licence

Copyright Alex Norman, GNU GPL licence Version 3.

Webpage

JackCpp is available here: JackCpp webpage. There you will find the source code as well as some brief examples.
